description: Make this recipe for a tasty breakfast for two. With eggs, chorizo and tomato relish, it's a filling, flavoursome way to start the day.
name: Egg, Chorizo & Tomato Relish Breakfast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pan from the heat and take the eggs out using a spatula. Place the eggs over the relish, place the chorizo over the egg and relish, sprinkle on the parsley and serve.
